name.value: Nictiz Geboortezorg - Client - Scenario 1.2 - Retrieve Integrale Zwangerschapskaart resources of first pregnancy of Hanna Kooij

description.value: Scenario 1.2: Retrieve Integrale Zwangerschapskaart resources of first pregnancy of Hanna Kooij
Query Patient resource for HCIM Patient
Test PHR client to retrieve Patient resources.
Confirm that HTTP header Authorization contains the patient token ${patient-token-id}
Make sure that the test server (WildFHIR) gives a success response.
Confirm that the test server (WildFHIR) returns a Bundle.
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 Patient resource(s).
